name: Toilet's Paper Crush
description:
Intro:

Being a starter Game Jam participant, Joined Together is such a difficult theme which takes  me  so much time to brainstorm the ideas and mechanics of this game. 

Gameplay is pretty simple, use mouse to draw trampoline to avoid the toilet paper to drop down. The  game contains 5 levels with a final one is an ending. Every level has a target score and you should put the toilet paper into the toilet in order to gain score. For every level you pass, the bridge will get built and after 5 levels, it will be completely built and two bridge-head  will be joined-together. And that's the time when mr toilet paper meet his crush :>>>.

How to play:

Whenever you left click the mouse and release, a trampoline will appear to stop the toilet paper from falling.

Toilet paper hits the trampoline will get 50 points and the toilet paper hits the toilet zone will get 100 points.

Enjoy playing :>>>.
